reviews.review:
No wonder there is so many freaking cheaters in this dumb ass stupid game. When you have to paly alone with 4 fucking russians who does not even know where to place their crosshair, and you have to play the game 1v9 and you inevitable lose the game 16-1 or 16-2.

1. I dont not recommend anyone to ever buy this dumb game, because either you will meet 4 russians who wont communicate at all, and ruin your game experience

2. You are going to meet one or two of the many thousands hackers there is in this game because they can't develop an anti-cheat like EVERY OTHER 3rd party web-side has (FaceIT, ESEA, etc.)

To sum up my review:
Don't buy this game, you won't enjoy more than 1-2 minutes of each game, as well as Valve should hire a team who actually know how to develop an anti-cheat that can stop the hacking in this dumbfuck game so you MAYBE can enjoy the game.
